ext.description: quick open navigate previous in editor picker, and reveal in side bar, and copy path/folder/file name...
opened-editors.configuration.revealSideb: Controls whether opened editors reveal in the editor title menu
opened-editors.configuration.openedEdito: Controls whether show opened editors in the editor title menu
opened-editors.configuration.copyFileNam: Controls whether the copy file name in the editor title menu
opened-editors.configuration.copyFolderN: Controls whether the copy folder name in the editor title menu
opened-editors.configuration.fileTreeExc: Configure glob patterns for excluding files and folders.
opened-editors.configuration.fileTreeExp: The generated format, `markdown` or `txt` plain text
opened-editors.message.fileTreeHasBeenCo: The file tree has been copied to the clipboard :)
opened-editors.command.revealSidebar: Opened Editors: Reveal In Side Bar
opened-editors.command.copyFileNameWithE: Opened Editors: Copy File Name With Extension
opened-editors.command.chinesePunctuatio: Opened Editors: Wrap the selected text with ‘chinese single quote’
Opened Editors: Wrap the selected text with “chinese double quote”
Opened Editors: Wrap the selected text with 〈chinese single guillemet〉
Opened Editors: Wrap the selected text with 《chinese double guillemet》
